content.question: What is the value of <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> at which the minimum value of <math alttext="y equals, 3 times x to the four thirds power, minus 2 x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup><mo>âˆ’</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> occurs on the closed interval <math alttext="open bracket, 0 comma 1, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?
